wrapLineLength.description: The length of line wrap size

useTabs.description: Indent with tabs instead of spaces

sortHtmlAttributes.description: Sort HTML Attributes in the specified order. `none`, `alphabetical`, `code-guide`, `idiomatic`, `vuejs`

noMultipleEmptyLines.description: Collapses multiple blank lines into a single blank line

componentPrefix.description: Specify custom prefixes for component names. This changes the format rules applied to custom components e.g. preserve style in attributes.
